text: Mutare is the fourth largest city in Zimbabwe. It is the capital city of Machinaland Province and has about 190,000 people.https://www.bbc.com/news/business-35482142 | Aids in Zimbabwe: Making decent burials affordable - BBC Newshttp://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/africa/1829845.stm | BBC NEWS | Africa | Zimbabwe votes: Manicaland == References == Category:Cities in Zimbabwe
